verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, to whom <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> <S%H410>belongs<s%>; O God, to whom <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> <S%H3313>belongs<s%>, show yourself.
Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H8199>yourself<s%>, you judge of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: <S%H7725>render<s%> a <S%H1576>reward<s%> to the <S%H1343>proud<s%>.
<S%H3068>Lord<s%>, how long shall the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, how long shall the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5937>triumph<s%>?
How long shall they <S%H5042>utter<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> hard <S%H6277>things<s%>? and all the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> boast <S%H559>themselves<s%>?
They break in <S%H1792>pieces<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5159>heritage<s%>.
They <S%H2026>kill<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, and <S%H7523>murder<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>.
Yet they <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H3050>Lord<s%> shall not <S%H7200>see<s%>, neither shall the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> regard <S%H995>it<s%>.
<S%H995>Understand<s%>, you <S%H1197>brutish<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and you <S%H3684>fools<s%>, when will you be <S%H7919>wise<s%>?
He that <S%H5193>planted<s%> the <S%H241>ear<s%>, shall he not <S%H8085>hear<s%>? he that <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H5869>eye<s%>, shall he not <S%H5027>see<s%>?
He that <S%H3256>chastises<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, shall not he <S%H3198>correct<s%>? he that <S%H3925>teaches<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, shall not he know?
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, that they are <S%H1892>vanity<s%>.
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> whom you <S%H3256>chasten<s%>, O <S%H3050>Lord<s%>, and <S%H3925>teach<s%> him out of your <S%H8451>law<s%>;
That you may give him <S%H8252>rest<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7451>adversity<s%>, until the <S%H7845>pit<s%> be <S%H3738>dug<s%> for the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not cast <S%H5203>off<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, neither will he <S%H5800>forsake<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
But <S%H4941>judgment<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: and all the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall follow <S%H310>it<s%>.
Who will rise <S%H6965>up<s%> for me against the <S%H7489>evildoers<s%>? or who will stand <S%H3320>up<s%> for me against the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>?
<S%H3884>Unless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had been my <S%H5833>help<s%>, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> had <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H7931>lived<s%> in <S%H1745>silence<s%>.
When I <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4131>slips<s%>; your <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, held me <S%H5582>up<s%>.
In the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of my <S%H8312>thoughts<s%> <S%H7130>inside<s%> me your <S%H8575>comforts<s%> <S%H8173>delight<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Shall the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1942>iniquity<s%> have <S%H2266>fellowship<s%> with <S%H3335>you<s%>, which frames <S%H5999>mischief<s%> by a <S%H2706>law<s%>?
They gather themselves <S%H1413>together<s%> against the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, and <S%H7561>condemn<s%> the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.
But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H4869>defense<s%>; and my <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H4268>refuge<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7725>bring<s%> upon them their own <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, and shall cut them <S%H6789>off<s%> in their own <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>; <S%H3068>Yes<s%>, the Lord our <S%H430>God<s%> shall cut them <S%H6789>off<s%>.
